title: Lights Out
description: Lights Out is a challenging puzzle game where the player is presented with a grid of lights, some of which are on and some off. The goal is to turn off all the lights on the grid. Toggling a light also toggles the adjacent lights. The catch is that toggling a light affects its neighbors, making it a strategic challenge to find the correct sequence of moves to turn off all the lights. The game tests logic, problem-solving skills, and spatial reasoning.
author: Mist
